items.name: Heal Aid
items.desc:
Miracle imparted as charity to those of little faith. A show of tolerance from the Way of White.

Slightly restores HP.

To use miracles, equip a talisman or sacred chime and attune a miracle at a bonfire.

items.name: Heal
items.desc:
Elementary miracle cast by clerics. Restores HP for self and those in the vicinity.

To use miracles, equip a talisman or sacred chime and attune a miracle at a bonfire.

items.name: Replenishment
items.desc:
Miracle once cherished by cleric knights. Gradually restores HP.

Replenishment is a relic of the old Lloyd faith, whose cleric knights were unfaltering in battle.
